1223660.name: The Savana
1223660.description:
The Savana is a Survival game in the theme of the savana in Multiplayer Online, on a realistic maps on a world open to the third person.

Objective : there is no specific objective, you must survive ... Eat / Drink, but beware the card is full of predators who must also feed this! ! You can be a predator and at the click of a finger ... become a target!

As the players themselves learn to grow, flourish and prosper, the world will evolve under your feet, your decisions will have an impact on the ecosystem of the map! Your mistakes will be radically punished!

Where is The Savana at?

The Savana is currently in development, we are actively working to offer players many features, we are looking for qualified profiles in certain areas such as beta testing. Please do not purchase Savannah currently if you are looking for a full version of Survival Mode, updates are in development to ensure better content! we need to join the DISCORD In order to follow the progress!
1223660.supported_languages:
法语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
